Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: Rotation Solver Reborn
Description:
Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.
Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.
It is designed for `general combat`, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.
Punchline: Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* BRD and GNB rollback hotfix by @LTS-FFXIV in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/668


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/compare/7.2.0.29...7.2.0.30

Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: ActionTimeline Reborn
Description: Configurable timeline display of all the actions you use.

Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: EasyZoom Reborn

Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: GatherBuddy Reborn
Description: Adds commands to simplify gathering by finding nodes and fish and their locations via item name and a UI to keep track of special uptime and weather conditions. Also automatically gathers items based on these conditions using lists that you specify. Automated gathering requires vnavmesh.
Punchline: Simplify Gathering and Fishing to the extreme.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Added web service for fishing data collection by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/344
* Refactor CI workflow to separate plugin and web jobs by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/345
* Update build and Docker workflow parameters by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/346
* Add support for forwarded headers in HTTP requests by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/347
* Refine API key logging by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/348
* Remove hardcoded API key and update build process. by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/349
* Update build process to include generated secret keys file by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/350
* Add key generation step to publish workflow by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/351
* Update secret key reference in publish workflow by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/353
* Gearset fix by @CritoCantCode in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/352
* Add SECRET_KEY to workflow environment variables by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/354
* Update SECRET_KEY handling in GitHub Actions workflow by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/355
* Update key variable from SECRET_KEY to RANDOM in workflows by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/356
* Here fishy fishy by @NostraThomas99 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/358
